00008 Original code parsed files in json format.

00010 course CSE 533S: Pattern Oriented Software Design and Development, Summer 2009.

00014 #pragma once

00018 namespace PDI

00020 
00021 class Reader
00022 {
00023 public:
00024    struct Location
00025    {
00026       Location();
00027 
00028       unsigned int m_nLine;       // document line, zero-indexed
00029       unsigned int m_nLineOffset; // character offset from beginning of line, zero indexed
00030       unsigned int m_nDocOffset;  // character offset from entire document, zero indexed
00031    };
00032 
00033    static void Read(Element& elementRoot, std::istream& istr);
00034 
00035 private:
00036    class InputStream;
00037 
00038    enum TokenType;
00039    struct Token;
00040    typedef std::vector<Token> Tokens;
00041    class TokenStream;
00042 
00043    // scanning istream into token sequence
00044    void Scan(Tokens& tokens, InputStream& inputStream);
00045 
00046    void EatWhiteSpace(InputStream& inputStream);
00047    void MatchComment(std::string& sComment, InputStream& inputStream);
00048    void MatchString(std::string& sValue, InputStream& inputStream);
00049    void MatchNumber(std::string& sNumber, InputStream& inputStream);
00050    void MatchExpectedString(const std::string& sExpected, InputStream& inputStream);
00051 
00052    // parsing token sequence into element structure
00053    void Parse(Element& element, TokenStream& tokenStream);
00054    void Parse(Array& array, TokenStream& tokenStream);
00055    void Parse(DisplayElement& string, TokenStream& tokenStream);
00056    void Parse(Null& null, TokenStream& tokenStream);
00057 
00058    const std::string& MatchExpectedToken(TokenType nExpected, TokenStream& tokenStream);
00059 };
